Name: Dusk Jewel
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Sneasel and Weavile.  Swap a Sneasel Claw and a Sneasel Card for a Dusk Jewel at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
